title: proc
description: A function from an imported library.

host.description: The host that executed the process. May be an actual or a virtual / notional host.

exe.description: The file considered the "main" executable for the process. For example, rundll32.exe may be considered the "main" executable for DLLs loaded by that program.

cmd.description: The command string used to launch the process, including any command line parameters.

time.description: The start time for the process.

exitcode.description: The exit code for the process.

user.description: The user name of the process owner.

account.description: The account of the process owner.

path.description: The path to the executable of the process.

src:exe.description: The path to the executable which started the process.

src:proc.description: The process which created the process.

killedby.description: The process which killed this process.
